articles.title: Webb Finds Water Vapor, But From a Rocky Planet or Its Star? - NASA
articles.description: Astronomers used NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope to study a rocky exoplanet known as GJ 486 b, and their observations using Webb’s Near-Infrared Spectrograph (NIRSpec) show hints of water vapor.
